moves1.heading: THE WAY I MOVE
moves1.choice2:
I GLIDE LIKE A KNIFE
THROUGH BUTTER.

moves2.heading: THE WAY I MOVE
moves2.choice1:
HEADS TURN WHEN I'VE
GOT MY LATIN SWING ON.
moves2.choice2:
HIPS, HOPS, AND SPINS.
I'M ALL OVER THE PLACE.

speed1.heading: THIS IS MY SPEED
speed1.choice2:
FIVE-POINT HARNESS
SEAT BELT, ROLL BAR,
FIRE-SAFE RACING SUIT,
RABBIT'S FOOT.

speed2.heading: THIS IS MY SPEED
speed2.choice2:
FIVE-POINT HARNESS
SEAT BELT, ROLL BAR,
FIRE-SAFE RACING SUIT,
RABBIT'S FOOT.

detachable.heading:
You are an Ultrabook™ detachable.
No one can pin you down. You're a free spirit.
Your style. Your Ultrabook™
detachable.footer: But you could rock any of these, too.

flip.heading:
You are a playful Ultrabook™ flip.
Show off your moves and have fun with it.
Your style. Your Ultrabook™
flip.footer: <span class="choiceTextSmall">But you could rock any of these, too.

slide.heading:
You are a sleek Ultrabook™ slider.
You own the dance floor with your smooth moves.
Your style. Your Ultrabook™
slide.footer: <span class="choiceTextSmall">But you could rock any of these, too.

swivel.heading:
You are a sexy Ultrabook™ swivel.
You need room to move and show the world your style.
Your style. Your Ultrabook™
swivel.footer: <span class="choiceTextSmall">But you could rock any of these, too.

clamshell.heading:
You are a sleek, responsive Ultrabook™ standard.
You are understated, but make a statement wherever you go.
Your style. Your Ultrabook™
clamshell.footer: <span class="choiceTextSmall">But you could rock any of these, too.

social.generalTwitterPost: What's your Ultra Style? Take the Ultrabook™ quiz and find out. http://shoppercampaigns.intel.com/embed/ism/en_us/index.htm

shareStandardLink.twitter: As an Ultrabook™ standard, I'm understated but make a statement. Which Ultrabook™ are you? Take the Ultra Style quiz. http://shoppercampaigns.intel.com/embed/ism/en_us/index.htm

shareSwivelLink.twitter: As an Ultrabook™ swivel, I make everyone in the room stop and stare. Which Ultrabook™ are you? Take the Ultra Style quiz. http://shoppercampaigns.intel.com/embed/ism/en_us/index.htm

shareSlideLink.twitter: As an Ultrabook™ slider, I glide effortlessly through life. Which Ultrabook™ are you? Take the Ultra Style quiz. http://shoppercampaigns.intel.com/embed/ism/en_us/index.htm

shareFlipLink.twitter: As an Ultrabook™ flip, I love to mix things up when I feel like it. Which Ultrabook™ are you? Take the Ultra Style quiz. http://shoppercampaigns.intel.com/embed/ism/en_us/index.htm

shareDetachLink.twitter: As an Ultrabook™ detachable, I'm a free spirit and travel light. Which Ultrabook™ are you? Take the Ultra Style quiz. http://shoppercampaigns.intel.com/embed/ism/en_us/index.htm
